EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday, April 23rd at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop - Atlanta
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up next Thursday, April 23rd in Atlanta, Georgia. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Thursday, April 23rd, 2015 8:30am - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/atlanta>
Atlanta Marriott Marquis 265 Peachtree Center Avenue Atlanta, GA 3003 Map & Directions <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/fact-sheet/travel/atlmq-atlanta-marriott-marquis/>
Parking Information Valet parking, fee: $35. Off-site parking, fee: $20
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS?
Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at (631) 388-0569.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/atlanta>
